Title: V-Neck Corded Applique Over Lace Gown

Category: evening, formal-gowns

Featured-image: 2209-black-v-neck-corded-applique-over-lace-gown_p.jpg

----

Description: V-neck lace gown with corded applique creating a paisley design and a belted waistline. The tulle skirt flares into a mermaid silhouette and covers the sheer form fitting lace gown and it flows into a sweeping train. There is a peplum that accents the waist.
